name: RetroFix AI
headline: Turbo Tax for Building Rebates
description: RetroFix is a web platform that allows contractors to automatically apply for tax incentives and sustainability credits. Currently, contractors rarely apply for credits because discovering incentives, checking eligibility, and applying are all done manually via emails and phone calls with local utilities and/or government offices. RetroFix consolidates information on government incentives and allows building managers/contractors to apply in minutes, saving hundreds of thousands of dollars per building.

founders.name: Isaac Toscano, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder/CEO at RetroFix AI. Before Retrofix I studied Materials Engineering at MIT, made financial models for billion dollar companies, did solar cell research at MIT's Nano lab and spend the weekends drilling Muay Thai.

founders.name: Daniel Portela, Co-Founder, CTO
founders.description: Co-Founder, CTO @ RetroFix AI | MIT CS | 🇵🇷

generated_description:
**RetroFix AI: Revolutionizing Tax Rebates for Building Contractors**

Founded in 2024 and based in San Francisco, RetroFix AI is poised to transform the way contractors engage with tax incentives and sustainability credits. Think of them as “TurboTax for Building Rebates.” The company, part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, aims to automate and simplify the process of finding and applying for various tax incentives, allowing contractors to save time and money—potentially hundreds of thousands of dollars per project.

**The Problem They Solve**
Traditionally, contractors faced cumbersome hurdles when trying to access tax credits and sustainability incentives. The process could involve endless calls and emails, deciphering complex eligibility criteria, and navigating outdated application systems. RetroFix AI addresses these issues head-on by consolidating vital information about government incentives into one streamlined platform.

**What They Offer**
RetroFix AI provides a robust solution for contractors by offering:
- **Instant AI Assistance**: Get quick, accurate answers regarding rebate programs.
- **Affordable Reporting**: Generate crucial reports easily using local data and AI analysis.
- **Maximized Incentives**: The platform identifies and stacks applicable rebates, ensuring the maximum savings for each project.
- **Streamlined Applications**: Easily apply for multiple incentives through a single, user-friendly interface.

In short, RetroFix takes the headache out of rebate applications, letting contractors focus on their core work while the platform handles paperwork and submissions.

**Team and Leadership**
With a lean team of two employees, RetroFix AI is still in its early-access phase but is eager to collaborate with potential users. Gustaf Alstromer, a Y Combinator partner, lends his expertise and network to guide the company in its mission to expand and refine its offerings.

**Conclusion**
RetroFix AI is tackling a crucial niche in the building and sustainability sector. By leveraging artificial intelligence to simplify tax incentive applications for contractors, they’re not just streamlining processes—they're enabling a paradigm shift in how these rebates are accessed. If you're a contractor looking to maximize your project’s financial efficiency, RetroFix could be the partner you've been searching for. For more information, visit [retrofix.ai](https://www.retrofix.ai/).
